mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM movieInfo
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num,id,title,content,opendate,liketo,orgFileName,saveFileName,fileSize,regdate FROM movieInfo
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1 )
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movieInfo (num, id, title,content,opendate,liketo, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(movieInfo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title},#{content},#{opendate},#{liketo}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
